build.buildCommand: composer install --no-dev --optimize-autoloader && php artisan config:cache && php artisan route:cache && php artisan view:cache && npm ci && npm run build

deploy.startCommand: php artisan migrate --force && php artisan db:seed --class=BannerSeeder --force && php artisan storage:link && php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=${PORT:-8080}
